sources.full: Un adventure a traverse des mondes

action.name: A Handful of Fire:
entries: You collect the flames in your palm and unleash them in the direction of your foe.
{@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target.  {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.
If you throw the flames further than the range, they will fall to the ground somewhere near where you had aimed.

reaction.name: Fiery Shield
entries: You create a shield of burning red flames that protects an ally of yours which you choose from an incoming attack. The target gains +2 AC and if the attack still hits, the attacker takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

Flamme ist ein Tabaxi unter Kralle's Herrschaft. Er fühlt sich genötigt dazu, Schwächere dauernd an ihre unterlegene Stellung ihm gegenüber erinnern zu müssen. Er selbst versucht stets, perfekt zu sein, was ihm jedoch nie ganz gelingt. Um nicht an seine Fehler erinnert zu werden, entdeckt er dauernd bei anderen welche, aber er hat gesunden Respekt vor Kralle. Seinen Bruder hält er für komplett unterlegen, aber ihn ihm existiert eine Angst, dass er ihn irgendwann besiegt.

action.name: Windblade
entries: Cantrip. {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h} 10 ({@damage 2d6+3}) wind damage.

action.name: Zephyr's Caress
entries: 1st level spell. You conjure a gentle breeze that envelops you, providing a soothing and refreshing touch. For the duration, you gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws against being grappled or restrained. Additionally, the gentle wind grants you a +2 bonus to your AC against ranged attacks, as the zephyr redirects incoming projectiles away from you.

action.name: Galeforce Surge
entries: A powerful gust of wind surges forth from your outstretched hand, creating a localized stormy area. Choose a point within range. Each creature in a 20-foot radius centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the center. Additionally, the area is considered difficult terrain for the duration.

On a failed save, a creature takes 8 ({@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked prone. This spell's damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd. While concentrating on this spell, as a bonus action on your turn, you can choose a new point for the spell's effect to originate from, provided it is within range.

action.name: Tornado
entries: 3rd level. AoE Spell Attack: reach 60 ft., range: a cone with a diameter of 10 ft and height of 40 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8+3}) wind damage.

A creature must make a strength saving throw DC 15 when starting a turn in the area or enters it for the first time. If it fails, it gets pulled up in the air and gets hit. If it succeeds, it stays on the ground but takes 10 ({@damage 2d6+3}) wind damage.
Sturm am Horizont is a medium humanoid of chaotic neutral alignment.

action.name: Water Serpent
entries: You summon a giant serpent out of the ground, made of the moisture in the air. If there is none/not enough, the spell fails/the damage gets reduced by 1d8.
The serpent is loyal to you and your companions and will attack the enemies without commands.
{@atk m}: Bite {@hit 7}. One target, {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) water damage.

action.name: Sprinkler
entries: You collect water from the air in your palm and unleash it in the direction of your foe.
{@atk rs} {@hit 7}. One target, range 60ft., {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) water damage.

action.name: Waterspout
entries: A spiral of water comes out of the ground and shoots in the direction of your target.
{@atk rs} {@hit 7}. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) water damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: You extend your sharpened claws to slash an enemy
{@atk m} {@hit 7} to hit, range 5 ft., one target.  {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8+4}) slashing damage.
Kralle ist der BBEG der Phase und hat die meisten Tabaxis des Dorfs versklavt und seinem Willen unterworfen.
